text.p: HBO & Co said Tuesday it has signed a definitive agreement to buy GMIS Inc, a Pennsylvania-based provider of clinical information systems for managed care.

HBO & Co said the deal gives GMIS shareholders 0.42 of a share of HBO common stock for each share of GMIS common, as long as the average HBO share price remains between $47.62 and $64.00 during the pricing period.
If average HBOC rises above $64 or below $47.62 a share, HBO & Co said, GMIS shareholders will get a fraction of a share of HBOC common valued at $26.88 or $20.00, respectively, per GMIS share.
The deal awaits regulatory and GMIS shareholder approval. HBO & Co said it would be accounted for as a pooling of interests and close during the fourth quarter of 1996.
HBO & Co provides patient care and financial and management software solutions to healthcare organizations. It said GMIS has more than 250 customers and had 1995 revenue of $36 million.
